page.title: 17Leisure in Alvechurch.
page.content: In Alvechurch there are clubs for children from the age of 7 to the age of 18, including youth clubs, brownies, girl guides, cubs, scouts, seekers. There is also a disco in the village hall at times. The school also does a disco about once every 2 months. There is a canal where some people fish and there is a small library in Alvechurch. There are 2 clubs and 3 pubs, one is a working mens club. Down Meadow Lane, opposite the Red Lion, are the meadows with a football pitch, swings, a slide, a roundabout, a tyre swing, and shelters. In Peck Wood, a wood not far from the village there is an adventure playground for children from Birmingham.
